org.ntnu.utility
Class TimerTaskUpdateStatusBar

java.lang.Object
  java.util.TimerTask
      org.ntnu.utility.TimerTaskUpdateStatusBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
 class TimerTaskUpdateStatusBar
extends java.util.TimerTask

This class is a TimerTask which takes care of updating the gui while a thread is running.

Author:
Martin Matusiak

Method Summary
 void run()
          This method is invoked every fixed interval and updates the gui if the thread is still running.

Method Detail

run

public void run()
This method is invoked every fixed interval and updates the gui if the thread is still running. Otherwise, it calls the post-thread methods of GuiPanelGeneric.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
